actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prevent the reduction of pension benefits for veterans, and survivors of veterans, of the Mexican border period, World War I, World War II, the Korean conflict, and the Vietnam era, as the result of adjustment on Social Security annuities.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Authorizes increases in certain pensions to veterans and their survivors of the Mexican border period, World Wars I and II, the Korean conflict, and the Vietnam era to match increases in social security payments.

titles.title: A bill to prevent the reduction of pension benefits for veterans, and survivors of veterans, of the Mexican border period, World War I, World War II, the Korean conflict, and the Vietnam era, as the result of adjustment on Social Security annuities.
